name: Paneer Tikka Sandwich
author: prea desai
summary: Paneer tikka sandwich is a popular afternoon snack that people like to have with hot or cold coffee. Its simple and quick to make, and you can add other toppings, like bell peppers or carrots as well.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons butter, divided, or more to taste
directions: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Add onions; cook and stir until softened, about 5 minutes
Stir in chile powder, garam masala, turmeric, sugar, and salt
Add paneer and tomato sauce; cook and stir until flavors combine, 3 to 5 minutes
Spread 1 teaspoon butter and 2 tablespoons of the paneer filling over 1 slice of bread
Place second slice of bread on top
Melt remaining 1 teaspoon butter in a large skillet over medium heat
Add sandwich; cook until golden brown, about 1 minute per side
